title: FixedCollectionSpecifier
description: These properties are available when mapping a fixed collection to a control. Typically the controls that make use of this definition display some sort of list to the user.

DisplayValue.description: The value to be displayed to the user. If not specified, the `ReturnValue` will be used.

ReturnValue.description: The value to return on selection.

oneOf.description: This is both the Display and Return values.
